synopsis.text: Legend has it that when the Evil God rises from the abyss, the deity of destiny will select six valiant heroes, known as the "Braves of the Six Flowers," and endow them with the strength to save the world. Adlet, a young man who boasts of being the strongest on Earth, is chosen as one of these heroes and sets off to the designated meeting place. However, instead of the expected six, seven heroes gather, sparking suspicion and uncertainty among the group. As the initial finger of suspicion points towards Adlet, an intricate web of mystery and adventure unfolds in this captivating fantasy tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
